table.name: ayaachi_parking_avail_data
table.description: Contains historical and analytical parking data. All analytical queries should use this table.

column.name: id
column.description: A unique ID for each data record.

column.name: system_code_number
column.description: The unique identifier for the car park.

column.name: capacity
column.description: The total number of parking spaces in the car park.

column.name: occupancy
column.description: The number of spaces that were occupied at the time of the record.

column.name: available_occupancy
column.description: The number of spaces that were available at the time of the record.

column.name: vehicle_type
column.description: The type of vehicle associated with the record.

column.name: traffic_condition_nearby
column.description: A description of the traffic status near the car park (e.g., 'heavy', 'light').

column.name: queue_length
column.description: The number of vehicles waiting to enter the car park at the time of the record.

column.name: is_special_day
column.description: A flag (1 for true, 0 for false) indicating if the record is from a special day or event.

column.name: record_timestamp
column.description: The exact date and time of the data record.

column.name: latitude
column.description: The geographic latitude of the car park.

column.name: longitude
column.description: The geographic longitude of the car park.

table.name: ayaachi_parking_latest_hbase_map
table.description: A real-time view of the latest data for all car parks, mapped from HBase.

column.name: system_code_number
column.description: The unique identifier for the car park. This is the primary key.

column.name: capacity
column.description: The total number of parking spaces in the car park.

column.name: occupancy
column.description: The number of spaces that are currently occupied.

column.name: available_occupancy
column.description: The number of spaces that are currently available.

column.name: queue_length
column.description: The number of vehicles currently waiting to enter the car park.

column.name: traffic_condition_nearby
column.description: A description of the current traffic status near the car park (e.g., 'heavy', 'light').

column.name: latitude
column.description: The geographic latitude of the car park.

column.name: longitude
column.description: The geographic longitude of the car park.
